title: Purchasing the wrong champion
body: I spent 3 days trying to save up IP for {{champion:59}}. I made up around 3150 ip. Out of curiosity, I went to the shop to check out Urgot's abilities since I remembered a game where I was destroyed by an Urgot. When I moused over to click learn more, I clicked too early and bought the champion by mistake. I already used my refunds up, so is there any way I could get my ip refunded, or is this an rp situation only?

replies.body: Thank you for informing me of this. However, my ip was refunded and urgot is back in the shop.

It looks like you used Urgot immediately after purchasing him so I'm not entirely sure if we'll be able to refund that IP purchase or not, but you're always more than welcome to reach out to our billing team in a ticket to see what could be done.
